General.Name: Samsung Special Purpose Acquisition 2 Co. Ltd
General.Description: Samsung Special Purpose Acquisition 2 Co., Ltd. does not have significant operations. It intends to acquire one or more businesses and assets through a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, and reorganization. The company was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Samsung Electronics Building, Seoul, South Korea
